name: TWINe (Event Horizon School)
description:
Our main character is a stuffed animal made of wool that can sew and unravel himself along his incredible journey. He has lost his way back home to his twin brother, in a story that, without saying a word, is told through each bond he will make.

The game is a mix between a puzzle game and an exploration game, strictly linked together by the need of finding the solution for each puzzle in order to complete them.

FEATURES:

  • Solve puzzles - Face with several puzzles inspired by the famous Euler’s Puzzles in which you recreate a shape without interrupting the drawing line.
  • Explore - Explore a vast open-world in order to find the solutions you need to solve the puzzles and much more.
  • Different abilities - Find a selection of items that allow you to change the character’s shape or move in mid-air.
  • Metroidvania style - Use your newly acquired abilities to overcome obstacles and reach new areas of the world
  • Boardgame setting - Immerse yourself in a world made of cardboard objects like you were a board piece in a gigantic world.
